reviews.review_text: The restaurant, situated just below Ginger Hotel, offers a delightful dining experience with its great staff and exceptional hospitality. The food quality is impressive, and the courteous staff adds to the overall charm. We especially enjoyed the coastal seafood thali and vegetarian thali for lunch, both of which were excellent.

During my two-day stay at Ginger Hotel, I had the pleasure of dining at The Coastal Tawa, which made my stay all the more enjoyable. The food here was absolutely delicious. Although the restaurant offers both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options, as a vegetarian, I truly appreciated their care and attentiveness in preparing veg dishes. Their service was impeccable‚Äîstaff members were very attentive, making sure customers were comfortable and satisfied with the taste and quality of the food.

The ambiance inside the restaurant was cozy and inviting, with a stylish dark theme and soothing music that set the perfect vibe for a relaxed meal. Another added convenience is its proximity to Madgaon Railway Station, making it a great stop for travelers.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place in madgaon, goa with excellent food, great service, and a warm atmosphere, The Coastal Tawa is definitely worth a visit!

A simple, decent place to enjoy a nice Goan meal. Very friendly and cooperative staff and ambience. I ate a Goan Fish thali and it was absolutely amazing. I have been longing to eat this meal since more than 15 years when i last visited the Konkan region. The food at Coastal Tawa made my day and made my soul feel contentüòçü•∞ü•∞
